meanings.sent1: She felt dressier in her new outfit.
meanings.sent2: The dressier attire was required for the fancy event.
meanings.sent3: He tried to look dressier by wearing a tie as a belt.
meanings.sent4: The room looked dressier with the addition of elegant curtains.
meanings.sent5: The dressier clothes made her stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: To make oneself more formally or stylishly dressed.
meanings.sent1: She decided to dressier for the party.
meanings.sent2: He always dressier up for job interviews.
meanings.sent3: They planned to dressier in matching outfits for the occasion.
meanings.sent4: The stylist helped her dressier for the red carpet event.
meanings.sent5: He knew how to dressier to impress his date.
